problem.markdown:
Through one state on the [mathjaxinline]T-s[/mathjaxinline] diagram of an ideal gas([mathjaxinline]s[/mathjaxinline] on the [mathjaxinline]x[/mathjaxinline]-axis), a constant volume line is plotted, and a constant pressure line plotted. Which line has a higher slope?
( ) The constant pressure line (x) The constant volume line ( ) The answer depends on the state.
problem.p: Through one state on the [mathjaxinline]T-s[/mathjaxinline] diagram of an ideal gas([mathjaxinline]s[/mathjaxinline] on the [mathjaxinline]x[/mathjaxinline]-axis), a constant volume line is plotted, and a constant pressure line plotted. Which line has a higher slope?

choicegroup.choice: The answer depends on the state.
